data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_B

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_C

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_D

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_E
data.value: 您的申请项目与数码科技范畴是否相关?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_F
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否在过去的18个月内申请或收到任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_G
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否申请，或在未来18个月将会申请，或预期接受，任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_H
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否申请数码港培育计划？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_I
data.value: 如您於问题2.2.1 (h) 回答“是”，您是以相同或相似的培育项目在申请CCMF吗？如果相似或不同，请澄清，并在下文第4.10节详细列出，使我们的评审小组能区别这申请及任何其他申请。

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_J
data.value: 申请人是否有机会构成任何利益冲突？如回答“是”， 请在下文第4.10节详细列出。另外，此申请是否过去曾提交到数码港及 / 或其他公营机构的资助计划？ 若是，请在下文第4.10节列明先前申请的项目并指出此申请与过去的申请的主要分别。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Comp_1_A
data.value:
截至本计划申请截止日时，您是否为香港注册(或正在注册成立)的有限公司?
请于第6.1部分上传公司注册证书或申请证明文件及商业登记。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Comp_1_B
data.value: 如否,您是否同意于被数码港创意微型基金录取之时于香港注册成立公司?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_A
data.value: 您的申请项目与数码科技范畴是否相关?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_B
data.value: 您及管理团队， 现正提交申请 CCMF 的项目或与之相似的项目或其他科技相关的项目有否在过去的 18 个月内申请或收到任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_C
data.value: 您及管理团队，现正提交申请 CCMF 的项目或与之相似或其他科技相关的项目有否申请，或在未来 18 个月将会申请，或预期接受，任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_D
data.value: 您现正提交申请 CCMF 的项目或与之相似的项目有否申请数码港培育计划？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_E
data.value:
您于问题2.1.2 (d) 回答“是”，您是以相同或相似的培育项目在申请CCMF吗？如果相似或不同，请澄清，并在下文第4.10节详细列出，使我们的评审小组能区别这申请及任何其他申请。

如采用同一个项目申请数码港创意微型基金及数码港培育计划 ，数码港管理有限公司只会考虑您于现招募提交的数码港培育计划申请，而不另行通知。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F
data.value: 申请人是否有机会构成任何利益冲突？如回答“是”， 请在下文第4.10节详细列出。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F_1
data.value: 此申请是否过去曾提交到数码港及 / 或其他公营机构的资助计划？若是，请在下文第4.10节列明先前申请的项目并指出此申请与过去的申请的主要分别。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F_note
data.value:
注: 申请人须披露真实、完整和准确的信息。如在申请期间违反CCMF之申请守则，有关申请可被视为不乎合资格，数码港将有绝对权取消申请人的申请资格或终止已获录取的项目。

如采用同一个项目申请数码港创意微型基金及数码港培育计划 ，数码港管理有限公司只会考虑您于现招募提交的数码港培育计划申请，而不另行通知。数码港大湾区青年创业计划申请指引及需知。

data.value:
注: 个人名义申请者，其主要申请人须持有香港永久居民身份证。否则，请考虑以公司名义申请。

有关CCMF之申请资格，请先详阅数码港大湾区青年创业计划申请指引及需知。

data.value:
截至本计划申请截止日时，您是否为香港注册(或正在注册成立)的有限公司?
请于第6.1部分上传公司注册证书或申请证明文件及商业登记。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_B
data.value: 如否,您是否同意於被数码港创意微型基金录取之时於香港注册成立公司?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_C
data.value: 您及您于下文第4.1节列出的所有项目管理团队队员在计划报名截止日期前是否介乎 18 到 30 岁之间?
data.comment: 于第4.1节列出的公司始创人中是否至少有一位介乎18至35 岁之间?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_C_note
data.value:
注: 在申请CCMF香港计划之香港青年创业计划时, 于第4.1节列出的公司始创人或其中一位始创人必须介乎18 至30 岁之间

该名合乎18 至30 岁申请资格之公司始创人/共同始创人于申请获录取后必须于6个月的CCMF项目进行期间于企业及项目团队中担当同样的身份及职权。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_2_D
data.value: 您及管理团队，现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似或其他数码科技相关的项目有否在过去的18个月内申请或收到任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_F_1
data.value: 此申请是否过去曾提交到数码港及 / 或其他公营机构的资助计划？若是，请在下文第4.10节列明先前申请的项目并指出此申请与过去的申请的主要分别。

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_G
data.value: 如您於问题2.1.2 (df) 回答“是”，您是以相同或相似的培育项目在申请CCMF吗？如果相似或不同，请澄清，并在下文第4.10节详细列出，使我们的评审小组能区别这申请及任何其他申请。

data.name: ID_Passport_Format
data.value: 香港身份证持有人，请输入完整编号，例如A123456(1)。护照编号，输入完整护照号码

data.name: Individual_and_Company_Applicant
data.value: 个人及公司名义申请者

data.name: Individual_Applicant
data.value: 个人名义申请者

data.name: Individual_Application
data.value: 个人名义申请

data.name: Instruction_0
data.value: 您需要：

data.name: Instruction_1
data.value: 於填写申请时，遵守以下要求：

data.name: Instruction_1_1
data.value: 除非另有规定，请使用<mark>英文</mark>填写申请;

data.name: Instruction_1_2
data.value: 将所有货币以<mark>港元</mark>填写;

data.name: Instruction_1_3
data.value: 用<mark>繁体中文</mark>填写中文信息;

data.name: Instruction_1_4
data.value: 当所需信息是不适用或无法使用时，填上<mark>“NA”</mark>;

data.name: Instruction_2
data.value: 递交申请表格前，请先详阅 数码港大湾区青年创业计划申请指引及需知(ENC.RF.015b)，请特别注意第1, 2及3部份。

data.name: Instruction_3
data.value: 申请表格必须由申请人填写。如果申请人是一家公司，表格必须由申请机构的董事或拥有人填写。否则，将不获处理。

data.name: Instruction_4
data.value: <mark class="mark-2">一个电邮帐户只适用于提交一个数码港创意微型基金之申请。 </mark>如提交多于一个项目，请用另一个电邮作申请用途。

data.name: Instruction_4_1
data.value:
请准备并于第六节上传包括但不限于下列文件：

     
  • 公司文件 (如商业登记、公司注册证书、公司始创人拥有权架构等)(如适用)
    •   
  • 身份证明文件 (如香港身份证、护照等)(如适用)
    •   
  • 其他补充资料如公司组织结构、项目管理团队个人履历、图像、图表、商业计划书等以阐述项目等(如适用)。
  • 建议您准备1分钟的视频剪辑/演示文件/幻灯片播放来阐述项目，请提供网址以下载有关档案(如适用)。

data.name: Instruction_5
data.value: 如有任何查询，请电邮至<mark class="mark-2">ccmf_enquiry@cyberport.hk</mark>.

data.name: Instruction_7
data.value: 备注: 此申请表的中文翻译仅供参考。如有差异，以英文版本为准。

data.name: Instruction_8
data.value: 香港数码港管理有限公司

data.value: 其他补充资料, 如商业计划书 (如适用)

注: 个人名义申请者，其主要申请人须持有香港永久居民身份证。否则，请考虑以公司名义申请。

如果同一个项目同时申请数码港创意微型基金及数码港培育计划，香港数码港只会考虑数码港培育计划之申请，恕不另行通知。

有关CCMF之申请资格，请先详阅 数码港大湾区青年创业计划申请指引及需知。

data.name: Step_4_Funding_Statussub

(详细列出(i)申请人(或由其成立的公司)在未来18个月内或在过去的18个月内，所有已获得或将获得或有权获得的所有任何公营及/或私人机构/计划资助和资金;(ii)这些资助来源所覆盖/将覆盖的支出性质;及(iii)由这些资助来源获得/将获得的金额及最高可获金额 )

注: 申请人须披露真实、完整和准确的信息。如在申请期间违反CCMF之申请守则，有关申请可被视为不乎合资格，数码港将有绝对权取消申请人的申请资格或终止已获录取的项目。有关CCMF之申请资格，请先详阅数码港大湾区青年创业计划申请指引及需知。

data.name: Step_6_Access
data.value: Access to and Correction of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Access_1
data.value: You have the right to request access to, and correction of, Your Data held by us. We may charge a reasonable fee for administering and processing your data access request. If you need to check whether we hold Your Data or if you wish to have access to, correct any of Your Data which is inaccurate, please write via e-mail to our Data Protection Officer at dpo@cyberport.hk or via mail to Level 6, Cyberport 2, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration
data.value: In consideration of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited (“HKCMCL”) considering and processing our application for funding from CCMF, we confirm our agreement and undertake the following by checking this box

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_1
data.value: We agree with all the terms and conditions set out in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme (ENC.RF.015b) governing the application of the Cyberport Creative Micro Fund Scheme.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_2
data.value: All information provided in this application as well as the accompanying information is true, not misleading in any manner and reflects the status of affairs as at the date of submission. I shall inform the Administration of the Cyberport Creative Micro Fund immediately if there are any changes to the above information.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_3
data.value: We are the creators of our proposed project the details of which have been described in Section 3 of this CCMF Application Form ("Project") and our Project is original. To the best of our knowledge, the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project are not under development or available anywhere in the world.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_4
data.value: The development, completion and use of the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project will not infringe the rights or intellectual property rights of any other party (whether registered or not), including but not limited to patent rights, trade mark rights, and copyright.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_5
data.value: Other than the funding programme(s) specified in Section 4.8 of this Application Form, we (whether individually or as part of any team) have not applied for or received any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the past 18 months and we are not applying for nor will we be entitled to receive any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the future 18 months. We will notify Cyberport immediately if we apply for or become entitled to any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project and when requested, provide evidence of payments made or received in respect of such programmes.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_6
data.value: We will use any grant to be received from the CCMF (if any) for the sole purpose of developing and completing the Project. We will not give away, share or othen/vise use any grant to be received from the CCMF in contravention of the law or any of the terms which apply to application for funding from the CCMF.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_7
data.value: We understand the information provided in this application will be disclosed to authorised Cyberport staff and vetting team for screening and vetting purposes. No Confidential Agreement of any kind will be signed with Cyberport or the authorised Cyberport staff and vetting members on any occasion.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_8
data.value: We give our consent to authorised Cyberport staff to carry out necessary due diligence/reference check for the purpose of assessing this application.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_9
data.value: We acknowledge that HKCMCL has absolute discretion to revoke this application and call for refund of the full amount of grant received by the applicant if any member of the team breaches any of the terms and conditions in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme (ENC.RF.015b), this CCMF Application Form and any other relevant agreement(s) between us and HKCMCL. If any of our conduct amounts to or may amount to a breach of criminal law, HKCMCL would report our conduct to the relevant law enforcement body.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport
data.value: “Cyberport”

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_1
data.value: means the community or development located at Telegraph Bay, Pokfulam including its offices, centres and arcade.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_2
data.value: We cannot use Your Data for direct marketing unless we have received your consent or indication of no objection. You may write to our Data Protection Officer or contact us via the contact information provided in our direct marketing materials to opt out from direct marketing at any time.

data.name: Step_6_DECLARATION
data.value: DECLARATION

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing
data.value: Direct Marketing

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing_1
data.value: In connection with direct marketing, we intend to use your name and email address to market and promote the services, products, facilities, activities, contests, conferences, lucky draws, events and promotional campaigns from time to time available relating to us or "Cyberport", or shops or merchants or hotel in the "Cyberport" or offered or hosted at "Cyberport" (including consumer goods, food and beverages, books and stationery, children goods and services, fashion and accessories, optical products, watches, jewellery, luxurious goods, personal care, health and beauty products and services, furniture and lifestyle goods, home furnishing and appliances, florists, sports gear and products, electronic products and appliances, banking and financial services, cinemas and theatres, cultural, entertainment facilities and activities, charity activities, leisure activities and performances, gift redemptions and car parking facilities)

data.name: Step_6_Full_Name
data.value: Full Name of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Full_Name_2
data.value: Full Name of Secondary Applicant

data.name: step_6_marketing
data.value: I agree to receive direct marketing information.

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
data.value: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_1
data.value: This Personal Information Collection Statement of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited ("us" or "we") applies to the personal data collected in this CCMF Application Form ("Personal Data").

data.name: step_6_personal_information_collection
data.value: l have read the Personal Information Collection Statement above.

data.name: Step_6_Privacy
data.value: Our Privacy Policy and Practices

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_1
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_2
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at http://www.cyberport.hk/en/privacy_policy for our general policy and practices in respect of our collection and use of personal data.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose
data.value: Purpose and Use of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_1
data.value: The Personal Data will be used for one or more of the following purposes:

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_2
data.value: processing your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_3
data.value: communicating with you if we have any/or question and update about your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_4
data.value: providing updates, services, products, facilities or activities and matters relating to our administration, management, operation and maintenance;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_5
data.value: designing, reviewing, evaluating and enhancing our services, products, facilities or activities (including conducting research, survey and analysis for those purposes);

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_6
data.value: direct marketing (please see "Direct Marketing" section below); and

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_7
data.value: handling complaints, legal, safety and security purposes.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_8
data.value: It is mandatory to provide the requested personal data, or we will not be able to process your application.

data.name: STEP_6_STATEMENT
data.value: This Statement is written in the English language and may be translated into other languages. In the event of any inconsistency between the English version and the translated version of this Statement, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Step_6_Title_Principal_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Title_2nd_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of Secondary Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data
data.value: Transfer of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_1
data.value: Your Data will not generally be disclosed or transferred to any other party in a form that would identify you, except in the following circumstances:

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_2
data.value: If we use third party suppliers or service providers who provide services to support our business operation or facilitate provision of our services, products, facilities or activities, we may provide Your Data to these suppliers or service providers.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_3
data.value: We may disclose Your Data to any governmental or law enforcement agency, judicial body or regulatory authority to whom we are required to make disclosure according to any law, regulation, court order, direction, code or guideline.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_4
data.value: In addition, Your Data may be accessed by, disclosed or transferred to any person under a duty of confidentiality to us (including our accountants, auditors, legal advisers or other professional advisers) for the purposes described in the "Purpose and Use of Your Data" section above.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_note
data.value: As the parties mentioned above may be located outside Hong Kong, Your Data may be transferred out of Hong Kong.

StudentID

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Ind_1_A
data.value: 下文第4.1节列出项目的香港管理团队队长是否拥有香港居民身份证及下文第4.1节列出项目的澳门/广东管理团队队长是否拥有澳门/中国居民身份证?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Comp_1_A
data.value: 您是否于香港拥有以法人身份注册的公司?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Comp_1_B
data.value: 如否,您是否同意于被数码港创意微型基金录取之时于香港注册成立公司?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_C
data.value: 您及您于下文第4.1节列出的所有项目管理团队队员均参加及完成创业培训?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_D
data.value: 您及您于下文第4.1节列出的所有项目管理团队队员在计划报名截止日期前是否介乎18到30 岁之间?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_E
data.value: 下文第4.1节列出的项目管理团队是否由50%或以上的香港居民组成?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_F
data.value: 下文第4.1节列出的所有香港项目管理团队队员现在是否就读于香港/澳门/广东地区注册的大专院校或毕业于上述院校不超过三年?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_G
data.value: 下文第4.1节列出的所有广东/澳门项目管理团队队员现在是否分别就读于广东/澳门注册的大专院校或毕业于上述院校不超过三年?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_H
data.value: 您的申请项目与数码科技范畴是否相关?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_I
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否在过去的18个月内申请或收到任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_J
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否申请，或在未来18个月将会申请，或预期接受，任何公营及/或私人机构/计划的资金或资助？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_K
data.value: 您现正提交申请CCMF的项目或与之相似的项目有否申请数码港培育计划？如回答“是”，请在下文第4.8节详细列出。

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_L
data.value: 如您于问题2.2 (k) 回答“是”，您是以相同或相似的培育项目在申请CCMF吗？如果相似或不同，请澄清，并在下文第4.10节详细列出，使我们的评审小组能区别这申请及任何其他申请。

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_M
data.value: 申请人是否有机会构成任何利益冲突？如回答“是”， 请在下文第4.10节详细列出。

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_N
data.value: 此申请是否过去曾提交到数码港及 / 或其他公营机构的资助计划？ 若是，请在下文第4.10节列明先前申请的项目并指出此申请与过去的申请的主要分别。
